{ "tiddlers": { "Task": { "text": "", "title": "Task", "tbl-type": "task", "status": "not started", "priority": "", "modified": "20190818063047429", "link": "App Idea", "description": "", "created": "20170129073634899" }, "$:/plugins/aaldrich/task-manager/task-table": { "text": "<>", "title": "$:/plugins/aaldrich/task-manager/task-table", "tbl-style-table": "", "tbl-style-container": "", "tbl-style-colgroup": "", "tbl-sort-type": "nsort", "tbl-sort-negate": "false", "tbl-sort-by": "title", "tbl-show-pagination": "false", "tbl-show-header": "true", "tbl-show-footer": "false", "tbl-show-edit": "false", "tbl-show-colgroup": "true", "tbl-show-caption": "true", "tbl-page-marker": "", "tbl-mode": "normal", "tbl-limit": "9999999", "tbl-filter": "[all[shadows+tiddlers]]+[field:tbl-type[task]field:link]-[[Task]]", "tbl-expand": "$:/plugins/aaldrich/tables/template/expand/edit", "tbl-columns": "tbl-checkbox tbl-expand-many title tags status priority tbl-button tbl-delete", "tbl-class": "tbl-style-tight", "tbl-checkbox-value-unselected": "rework", "tbl-checkbox-value-selected": "complete", "tbl-checkbox-tip": "mark complete", "tbl-checkbox-tag": "complete", "tbl-checkbox-field": "status", "tbl-checkbox-actions-unselected": "<$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $index=<> $value=\"\" />", "tbl-checkbox-actions-selected": "<$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $index=<> $value=\"background-color:#00f2a9;text-decoration: line-through;color:black;\" />", "tbl-caption": "
__''Project: ''<$text text=<>/>__
''Tags: ''<$edit-text size=\"60\" placeholder=\"Enter tags...\" tiddler=<> field=\"tags\" class=\"tbl-hidden-edit\"/>
''Description: ''<$edit-text size=\"60\" placeholder=\"Enter description...\" tiddler=<> field=\"description\" class=\"tbl-hidden-edit\"/>
<$edit-text tag=textarea placeholder=\"Enter project notes...\" tiddler=<> field=\"text\" class=\"tbl-hidden-edit-wide\"/>''Tasks assigned to <$text text=<>/>'' | //<$button class=\"tc-btn-invisible\"><$action-setfield $tiddler=\"Task\" link=<>/><$action-sendmessage $message=\"tm-new-tiddler\" $param=\"Task\"/>''new task {{$:/core/images/new-button}}''//

", "tbl-button-tip": "clone project", "tbl-button-icon": "{{$:/core/images/clone-button}}", "tbl-button-actions": "<$action-sendmessage $message=\"tm-new-tiddler\" $param=<>/>", "tbl-anything": "<$select tiddler=<> field=\"status\" default=\"\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n", "tbl-add-records": "", "tags": "[[task manager]]", "modified": "20191205042149882", "created": "20170212195932579" }, "Project": { "text": "", "title": "Project", "tbl-type": "project", "status": "not started", "priority": "", "modified": "20190818063419176", "link": "Work", "description": "", "created": "20170129073914903" }, "$:/plugins/aaldrich/task-manager/main": { "text": "{{$:/plugins/aaldrich/task-manager/realm-table}}", "title": "$:/plugins/aaldrich/task-manager/main", "tags": "$:/tags/SideBar", "modified": "20190818072832407", "created": "20170212202517005", "caption": "Task Manager" }, "$:/plugins/aaldrich/task-manager/readme": { "created": "20190818072648047", "text": "*required: \n\n**~TiddlyTables plugin\n\n**add //priority// to tbl-column-list of $:/plugins/aaldrich/tables/template/body/edit\n\n**add //status// to tbl-column-list of $:/plugins/aaldrich/tables/template/body/anything\n\n**click here to patch automatically: <$button>\n<$action-listops $tiddler=\"$:/plugins/aaldrich/tables/template/body/anything\" $field=\"tbl-column-list\" $subfilter=\"status\"/>\n<$action-listops $tiddler=\"$:/plugins/aaldrich/tables/template/body/edit\" $field=\"tbl-column-list\" $subfilter=\"priority\"/>\nFix Templates\n\n\n\n", "title": "$:/plugins/aaldrich/task-manager/readme", "tags": "", "modified": "20191206072349607" } } }
